titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress on the need for accurate guidelines for breast cancer screening for women ages 40-49.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 3/9/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress concerning: (1) the need for adequate breast cancer screenings for women between the ages of 40 through 49; and (2) the National Cancer Institute's recent statement regarding such screenings.
